alert.note: Alert for Penobscot; Piscataquis; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 3:28PM EDT until June 04 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Piscataquis County in north central Maine... Somerset County in west central Maine... North central Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles southwest of Billy-Jack Depot to near Baker Lake to Chamberlain Lake to 7 miles north of Telos Lake, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Tamway around 335 PM EDT. Chamberlain Lake around 345 PM EDT. Baxter State Park around 350 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
